definition: lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
genre of folk song with accompaniment of bamboo clappers
Lianhua county in Pingxiang 萍鄉|萍乡, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Lotus Supercenter has been widely recognized by Shanghai people.
sentences.chinese: 易初莲花购物中心已经被上海人普遍认可。

sentences.english: Listen, I got to level 25 and reached purple lotus swamp, right?
sentences.chinese: 听着，我现在25级了，然后到了紫莲花沼泽对吧？

sentences.english: Yadar I'm from the Lotus Pond Valley of the big Tieling City. My name's Yadar.
sentences.chinese: 我是来自大城市铁岭莲花池水沟子的，我名字叫丫蛋。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly hope that the small lotus is to envy Fu.
sentences.chinese: 竟希望小莲花当个妒妇。

sentences.english: Our airplane had a lotus painted on its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞机在机尾有莲花的图案。

sentences.english: The invertebrate takes itsname from the equally flashy terrestrial anemone flower.
sentences.chinese: 它和陆地生物银莲花一样，得名于它的华丽。

sentences.english: Open house of DAP Teratai Community Centre.
sentences.chinese: 莲花苑社区中心春节团拜。

sentences.english: Echeveria agavoides grows in a certain area of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 景天科拟石莲花属植物冬云生长在墨西哥特定的区域。

sentences.english: Tibet snow lotus flower has the glorious history as the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 藏医藏药上藏雪莲花作为药物已有悠久的历史。

sentences.english: Then he jumped back again, picking more flowers.
sentences.chinese: 然后他又跳回来再采莲花。

sentences.english: I got these Photos of loutas in Maya Roster VIllage.
sentences.chinese: 这是我在马雅渡假村里的池子拍的莲花。

sentences.english: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.chinese: 这朵银莲花是我最喜爱的植物之一。

sentences.english: Shaoxing Lotus Flower Fall has a long history. It was quite famous even in the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴莲花落起源甚早，宋时已颇流行。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷观音端坐在莲花瓣上，莲花下是波涛纹。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷观音端坐在莲花瓣上，莲花下是波涛纹。

sentences.english: He grabbed his little hand bell and placed it on the lotus flower.
sentences.chinese: 随手就把他的小引磬，放在莲花上面。

definition: white lotus (flower)/White Lotus society/same as 白蓮教|白莲教
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
Buddha's teachings/aura (around the head of Buddha)
Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
lit. twin lotus flowers on one stalk/fig. a devoted married couple
pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
